body: @localsneed38   Oh I see so this is what all those "wholesome" stories of a former nympho falling in love with a beta loser rarely show, that makes it somewhat more interesting thanks for telling me
Because this is a girl that was sleeping around long before she found " the one". The past caught up to her and turned her current bf into a cuck because one of her sexfriends likes recording videos.
Why did they skip the initial mind break moment? That's the best part of a NTR when they initially cheat, skipping to when she is already tamed is boring
a hoe or got blackmailed etc ?
